body.name: Heat Resistant Stove Top Covers for Electric Stove - 21×29.5inch Fireproof & Waterproof Electric Stove Cover - Glass Stove Top Protector for Prevent Scratches - Fiberglass Cloth (Red)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Fireproof & Heat Resistant 】Our glass stove top cover is made of premium glass fiber, the surface is coated with a liquid silicon protective layer, which can resistant heat up to 550℃/1022℉. The top stove cover mat can be placed on a stove that is turned off. Fireproof does not mean that it can withstand all the heat of the electric stove. We recommend waiting for 3 minutes after using the electric stove before putting on the cover.

【Protect Electric Stove Top】The glass stove top cover can protects your glass stove top or granite counter top from scratches, scrapes, and glass cracks dirt & spills.Excellent heat resistance, effectively protect your countertop from heat damage.

【Extra Countertop Space】The electric stove top cover measures 21 x 29.5in, Using this cover mat, your stove top can serve as extra counter space for preparing food or other activities. When you need to use the stove top, hang it on the wall with our included hooks, it will be a good splash guard.

【Easy to Clean & Store】After use, simply hand wash or pop your stovetop cover in the dishwasher. You can hang it on the wall to dry, and folded in a drawer will not take up a lot of your space, very convenient storage.

【One Mat Multi-Purpose】It can be used as a cooktop cover, countertop mat, dish drying mat, ironing mat, washing machine top cover. As a kitchen decoration, it is a wonderful gift. NOTE: Please measure your stove before placing an order and when you are using the stove, do not place the mat on the stovetop!
body.description: Stove Top Covers for Electric Stove Heat Resistant 550°C/1022°F Our electric stove cover made of premium silicone and fiberglass cloth which has a higher temperature resistance of 550°C/1022°F, you can placed on element that is turned off but still hot without waiting for it to cool down. Effective Protection You can use and move a variety of kitchen appliances on stove top protector, such as coffee maker, air fryer oven, stand mixer, slow cooker, toaster, Micro-wave oven and bread machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great on my stovetop
reviews.reviewText: Love the red color, fit is great and it's so easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stovetop cover is great for protecting my glass stovetop. When not cooking, I keep this on the stovetop.I can then temporarily set groceries or a pan on it.Attractive too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s perfect for the job I needed it to do

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Completely covers my stovetop and is nice material that wipes off nicely

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Protect your Stovetop
reviews.reviewText: I am really happy with this stovetop cover for flat top stoves. I’d looked at noodles but being short on storage area couldn’t figure out where I’d put it when using stovetop. This mat IS the ANSWER! It covers full stove top and I love that it keeps crumbs out of the little edge. It is easy to just roll up and stick in the pantry or hang it by the little loops when using the stovetop. No need to remit when you use just the oven because it is heat resistant for a pretty good bit. I love being able to take things from the oven and set on the top without worrying about leaving a mark on a wooden noodle. Easy to clean too, just wipe off with wet dishrag. You can use a soft brush if spills get on it. At about 1/3 the cost of the wooden noodle covers that are so popular this is most sensible buy. I hope you like yours as much as I like mine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Gets hot and smokes on still hot element
reviews.reviewText: Description states, " you can placed on element that is turned off but still hot without waiting for it to cool down." This is entirely untrue. It started smoking and was hot enough to burn my skin when I touched the up side of the cover. I purchased it because I have a kitten who is very curious and has stepped right on the burner while it was still hot. I was hoping that this "heat-resistant" mat would protect his little paws if he ever stepped on the stove while it was still hot. Very disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this item. Gave me more counter space. It's thick enough not to worry about any damage to electric stove top. Fits perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
